Title: I don't like ADCs

body: Fuck ADCs
Body: ready for updoots
<-- Updoot butten her
i pressed the button you pointed at, sorry for the downdoot
He outplayed himself like a Yasuo player.
You forgot "kog'maw shouldn't have lived" and "gut all support items".

I see old interface on that amount of responds.
If you look really closely, you'll notice this is fake.
Can't trust anything nowadays.
I want my money back.

EDIT: Also what a clickbait, I came here just because there was a cute guy in the thumbnail. Instead I got Ahri. REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!
